english.segment1: I'll take the pain for all you do, Anything to become your best friend, Always waiting with open arms, Only to run into rock solid hearts.
english.segment2: Moff me, Scoff me, Beat me, Kill me,
english.segment3: Give myself to all under a Dogwood tree, Treat me how you like, I don't care you see, I'll treat you the same no matter what you label me.
english.segment4: All I want to do is love you, Give me a chance to get inside of you, I would only give up my only kid, Just to help you spend forever with me, yah!
english.segment5: Try me once you'll be back for more, I'll change your life when i knock on your door, Once your booked you can tell about it, Then we'll get 'em all on it no one wants to quit.
english.segment6: Moff me, Scoff me, Beat me, Kill me,
english.segment7: Give myself to all under a Dogwood tree, Treat me how you like, I don't care you see, I'll treat you the same no matter what you label me, yee-ah!
english.segment8: All I want to do is love you, Give me a chance to get inside of you, I would only give up my only kid, Just to help you spend forever with me!
